duties_responsibilities.duty: Translate user requirements into new software designs or significant software revisions.
Create high-level architecture specifications and integrate with existing systems and platforms.
Provide expertise on the implications across different applications.
Approve business requirements, functional specifications, testing strategies, etc., ensuring alignment with architectural standards.
Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and apply architecture standards and guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 10+ years of experience within DevOps team with a focus on backend development.
Familiarity with AWS cloud-based environment; proficiency in Kubernetes and Terraform.
Knowledge of Data Dog preferred; familiarity with AWS governance and best practices.
Understanding of AWS cost optimization techniques and DataDog/observability tools.
